channel.title: Text on Casual Inference

item.title: Predictably comforting: The writings of Soo Ewe Jin
item.description: My father passed away on November 17, 2016. His life has been memorialized in countless tributes published in the Malaysian press and on social media. An executive editor at the most widely-read English daily in Malaysia, he had a popular weekly column: Sunday Starters. As a way of navigating the mourning process, I set out to collect all his writings published in The Star. Iâ€™m sure the editors would have given me all his writings if I had asked, but instead I wrote some code to scrape all 366 articles he authored from the website.
